description: Detect the use of "sc.exe" to change the startup type of a service to "disabled" or "demand"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False positives may occur with troubleshooting scripts
name: Service StartupType Change Via Sc.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\sc.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"sc.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ config\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*start*" AND process.command_line.text:("*disabled*" OR "*demand*")))
